website_summaries.verdict: Its superior sound quality makes this Sonos speaker a reliable choice, especially if you are looking for a portable unit.
pros: Stands out for its deep and rich sound, especially when paired with a stereo
Can be set up in five minutes using home WiFi
cons: Some users wish the software was more up-to-date

customer_reviews.title: If you don't think technology should continue to advance, go live in a cave
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fantastic! I have numerous sonos products and this is by far my favorite. Incredible sound and can now utilize airplay. I really don't understand how people can expect sonos to not have products become obsolete. I didn't think human progress and technological advancement would be such a difficult concept to grasp
customer_reviews.author: Jared Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: A serious limitation not disclosed in item description
customer_reviews.text: The sound information sent to the speaker (using WiFi, Ethernet or 3.5mm cable) suffers a 3 to 5 seconds processing delay which is fundamental to this product operation. When the sound is associated with an image (e.g. a movie shown on the computer) the result is ridiculous and the product is unusable. This essential fact should have been made clear in the description!
customer_reviews.author: fao

customer_reviews.title: It may doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two speakers with delivery to Russia. Speakers work only when an Ethernet wire is connected. When connected to ANY wifi network does not see the speaker or writes that the password is wrong. I got two bricks. I have sonos bar and it works great. But sonos five - terrible disappointment Maybe Sonos boost will help.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sonos is going on the wrong direction.  Hard to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Sonos used to be very easy to setup. I have owned Sonos products for 10 years. The new system and app is really poor. I bought two new Play 5s. The first one, I spent 20 minutes with the help desk to finally get it to work. But now I can't unplug it from the Ethernet cable. The second one, even with the Ethernet cable, is not working. And Sonos Help desk doesn't open on weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best of class brilliant sound in High fidelity!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectations! Amazed by the sound quality deep bass clarity of voices quick connectivity, I was able to pair it with my SONOS MOVE, through AirPlay and also the app, I was afraid I couldn’t pair them both , but I was able to, overall it’s an amazing speaker to own.
customer_reviews.author: Manyi chung

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, expensive ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for more than a month now. Plus : setup is easy, sound quality is good (not the greatest I have heard though), kind of portable with wireless. Cons: No bluetooth. You need subscription from tidal/deezer hifi if you want own choice of songs. For a good experience, you will need a stereo pair along with subwoofer which comes out to be quite expensive. No way to see what's the bitrate it's playing from tidal. Samba on NAS requires v1 support.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Between glitchy streaming and advertising on the stations.... not in love
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the Apple HomePod with this, and I wanted to like it but it is not compatible with my network, so sometimes it glitches streaming from my phone. Additionally, the “radio station” it provides has commercials. No Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Rell

customer_reviews.title: Superb & wonderful sound!
customer_reviews.text: My first Sonos speaker and I'm very, very happy. Unboxing, setup, and Trueplay Tuning was all a pleasure - quick and super easy. Just using Spotify at the moment, and integration was a snap. This Five cranks out more than enough sound for my apartment- full, rich sound and some seriously deep bass.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound and Option to Add Phono
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just amazing! I ran into an issue with the sound being way to low but after a quick google, I found out that there was a switch on my Audio Technica that was on phono. I switched it to Line and voila! I don’t know about pairing, but I’m able to push the turntable music to a Beam, a One, and 4 Play:1s. Vinyl all over the place! Very happy with this new speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Scott DeWalt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound -- even the bass is great without a sub
customer_reviews.text: We are critical listeners. We use the speaker in the master stateroom on our boat and it works great and fills the room with great sound. Was considering adding the Sonos sub, but it isn't needed. The bass is this unit is very robust.
customer_reviews.author: Dre4golf

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have three "five's" and have music throughout the house. Only issue I have is the app many times "cannot find the system" so I can't change stations or turn it off. But the speakers themselves are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Good upgrade to the old 5 and necessary to use the new Sonos app
customer_reviews.author: Richard Espinet

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with flaws
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, but did not stay connected to WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Swai Tun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounding speaker !
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is AWESOME. Fills large rooms with amazing highs, mids, and lots of bass. The only problem is I ended up buying a second one for stereo!
customer_reviews.author: Lenflecha

customer_reviews.title: Over the top fantastic use it for my home and I take it to work when I go to work.
customer_reviews.text: Over the top fantastic use it for my home and I take it to work when I go to work.
customer_reviews.author: mike duffy

customer_reviews.title: Wow - this is an amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: There's really not much to add that the multitude of reviews out there haven't said. This is an impressive speaker. I have a few Sonos products and have really been meaning to get my hands on the 5 due to the rave reviews. Well, when the new iteration dropped some months ago, I knew it's finally time. It replaces a Sonos one in my office and the sound reproduction - the lows, mids, and highs is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: St0rm

customer_reviews.title: Most likely will be incompatible with your existing Sonos system.
customer_reviews.text: Prepare to have to junk your equipment that is working fine and to buy even more stuff to make it all work. Highly hated. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone who wants to keep what they have already invested in.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Moshier

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of Sonos gear and these are simply the best you can buy with the deep bass, incredible ecosystem and app, decently small size and versatility. I have the Arc, which is a supreme product, but I put the 5 in every room where the sound just counts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Allred

customer_reviews.title: Clear and natural sound
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a quality speaker that would fit on our fireplace and fill our large living/dining room with a clear balanced sound. This speaker not only blends into the room but produces a clear and natural sound.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: very nice sound, app (s2)
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my two recent Sonos One purchases, and altogether they sound very good for music, which is what I used them for.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Balin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speaker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the size- great bass, midrange, high. Easy to set up & operate. Just bought my second speaker for stereo experience.
customer_reviews.author: shez

customer_reviews.title: Planned Obsolescence
customer_reviews.text: Sonos’ misguided attempt at upgrading their software has left my current system unusable in both the current software and the old software. PATHETIC. Stay away from this company. Their planned obsolescence makes investing in their very expensive products a risky proposition. If I could do it all over again I would never have invested my hard earned money on this company.
customer_reviews.author: dfwjr

customer_reviews.title: Buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in September and have been on the phone with sonos tech support at least ten times since then. Constantly just stops when I try to airplay from Apple music to this device. I'm currently using an iPhone 12, an eero pro network, and 1GB fiber connection. The sonos five is a about 20 feet from two different eero routers and just stops (not cutting out, full on stops) about every 20 minutes of listening. Sonos support is beyond worthless. I can't tell you how many times I have enjoyed my router on their instruction. They won't replace the product. I hate it. Absolutely hate it. It basically doesn't work with apple products.
customer_reviews.author: jdt2

customer_reviews.title: Sonos Best Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but there are limitations. It’s a speaker, it should handle any codec I throw at it. The line-in port will occasionally have a lip sync delay in movies and tv. I’ve never experienced this in any speaker before. What gives?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mackelburg

customer_reviews.title: Bricked by the latest software update
customer_reviews.text: I spent $3,000 on six of these speakers. They worked fine until yesterday when Sonos pushed the S2 software update out to my system. Now all six speakers are unusable with my system and according to posts on the Sonos site, the software update cannot be rolled back. Who can afford throwing $3,000 down the toilet?
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Curme

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous phone support.
customer_reviews.text: If they bother answering at all, be prepared to spend well over an hour or two just to reach a human. They don't have anything modern like a call back feature. And when you email them, you're lucky if they even get back to you in a week. Their reasonably good chat service can't resolve any sales issues, so you're out of luck there. Sound quality for the Play 5 is average to above average, and for the price, mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Need a great sounding speaker that is incredibly easy to set up?
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -Great sound -Easy to set up -Great bass -Good highs and lows -Connects to all music services -Sonos ios app is very good The Bad: -None The Bottom Line: I've never owned a Sonos before this speaker and I can say without a doubt this is the best sounding speaker that is easy to set up. The speaker is expensive but the ease of set up and the Sonos app is great making it worth it. I will pay a premium for ease of use and set up. The bass is very good in this speaker and plays all types of music well. Overall, I would recommend this Sonos Five speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: disposable speaker
customer_reviews.text: In few months to years, be prepared to throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: As a standalone or part of a system this thing is excellent. Everything about it has surpassed my expectations. I love the shape, simplicity, ease of use with the app and the sound quality is better than almost every speakers have ever owned. The Sonos app is really where this shines in my opinion... it integrates many popular services like Amazon Music, Audible, Audio books.com, Spotify, etc seamlessly. I know its a pretty hefty price rate but I feel like the quality and ease of use makes up for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Sonos
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst system imaginable. Configuration changes on its own. Works about half the time. Speakers arbitrarily disappear - frequently. Not sure what comparable products are available but I strongly advise staying away from any SONOS product.
customer_reviews.author: Piper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Speaker with excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. The set up was easy, the app is very user friendly. I enjoyed the tuning part of the set up. You can add any voice(Alexa, google) and music service(Pandora, spotify, audibles, etc). Also sono has its own free radio which I also enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Ive

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome and seamless integration with Sonos S2 system.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding speaker. It sounds the same as a play 5 gen 2 but you can’t pair them which didn’t matter to me
customer_reviews.author: Tim

product_meta.title: Sonos Five - The High-Fidelity Speaker for Superior Sound - Black
product_meta.description: Style:Speaker| Color:BlackImmerse yourself in music and more with Five, the high-fidelity speaker for superior sound, tuned by renowned producer Giles Martin. Experience deep bass and an ultra-wide soundstage. Use the line-in port to connect your turntable or another device, and enjoy simple control with the Sonos app or Apple AirPlay 2.
feature_bullets: All-new Sonos Five - Experience vividly clear, room-filling sound for music and more with Five, tuned by renowned producer Giles Martin. Enjoy control with the Sonos app, Apple AirPlay 2, and more.
Deep bass - Five's unrivalled acoustic design features three high-excursion woofers within a sealed architecture that eliminates reverb and echo.
Ultra-wide soundstage - Two precisely-angled side tweeters create spatial extension and rich stereo sound, while a center tweeter optimizes vocal playback.

Smart stereo sound - Place a single speaker horizontally for stereo sound. Pair two speakers in an upright position and each automatically adjusts to mono for more detailed stereo separation and an even wider soundstage.
Line-in and play - Connect your turntable, CD player, or other device directly to Five using the 3.5 mm line-in port.
Customized sound - Trueplay puts the speaker-tuning capability of the pros in the palm of your hands, adapting and optimizing the sound of the speaker to the unique acoustics of the room.
Compatible with the new generation of the Sonos app, Sonos S2.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
